message: PC FPS team would be awesome...i don't want to be in charge though
Sounds great, any other games you're thinking of?
laaaame...i really do not want to play black ops

Wouldn't have to be anything super competitive to start, just to play some matches.  TF2 would be fantastic (granted CEVO A reg has closed for the upcoming season -.-;) but I'd be willing to play and help organize for whatever we can get people for.

TF2 is where my most recent experience is, I'd also be fine with 1.6/Source, BFBC2, maybe even CoD4 (I'd like to avoid black ops sheerly on principle, but if it comes down to that being all we could field a team for I'd play).
I'm more than willing to take charge of it, kinda why I posted :P
CoD 4 would be fun...no black ops though i agree

Only thing that kills me is now looking at the TWL ladders, CoD4 only has 33 teams in their promode s&d ladder, less in the others.  And CEVO's CoD4 banner takes me to their Black Ops page, so they may be doing away with CoD4.  Which is incredibly stupid, since afaik most of the pro Euro teams are still playing 4.
im sure there would be enough people for a TF2 team though
We should put something on Teh Pwn facebook to see if anyone would be interested in a PC FPS team
Yeah.  We could hop in TWL for that.  Missed CEVO reg by a handful of days though ><;
So sad CoD: MW and MW2 aren't played anymore...friggin black ops...
So ok, we have a team now, and it looks like a steam group. Are we going to play together anytime soon?
